alert.note: Alert for Barron; Polk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 4:55PM CDT until July 27 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Barron County in northwestern Wisconsin... Southeastern Polk County in northwestern Wisconsin... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Centuria, or 35 miles north of River Falls, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Amery around 515 PM CDT. Clear Lake around 530 PM CDT. Clayton around 535 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Reeve, Deronda, Arland, Nye, Range, Wanderoos and Joel. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to shelter inside a strong building, and stay away from windows.
